wexpman.presentationlayer.modelbeans

Interface ResetableBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExperimentDetailsROBean, ExperimentDetailsRWBean

    public interface ResetableBean
    Methods to be implemented by beans which can be reset. Applies mainly to beans which were intended as request beans, but are implemented as session beans. I had to put together this mechanism because of several problems that exist when working with request scoped beans and the myfaces 1.1 / portlet api 1 combo (may apply to other combinations). At the same time, I did not want to implement a full session brokerage mechanism, since this is a workaround on limitations that will disappear in the future. One of the problems is described at http://marcus-christie.blogspot.com/2007/06 /jsf-portlet-fun-request-scoped-beans.html and refers to beans being created twice (i.e. beans not surviving from action to render phase). Other problems were detected when changing the state of a portlet placed alongside the portlet which uses the request scoped bean, and have to do with the numerous issues that prevent placing several portlets in the same page to work out-of-the-box (patches for that case are implemented in this project too)
    Author:
    Matias Alberto Gavinowich

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void resetBean()
      Indicates the bean should be reset
